medium: Fiberglas with antique Louis Vuitton trunk
title: Panda
description: colorful panda figure constructed of circular and cone shapes standing on antique trunk; swirling colored areas on white body and head in yellows, pinks, and oranges; large pink mouth; one pink ear with purple and green flower and one dark-red ear with green and blue flower; one red eye and one blue eye with small green nose
creditline: Collection of Gordon Locksley and George T. Shea
